title: Spicy corn, black bean & feta salad
description: An exciting main-course salad, packed with interesting flavours and textures and a hit of spice
ingredients: 400g can black beans , drained and rinsed
1 tbsp chipotle Tabasco sauce (use regular Tabasco if you can't find this)
steps: Boil the corn for 10 mins in salted water, rinse in cold water, then cut the kernels off. Tip the beans into a bowl with the cooked corn, avocado, tomatoes and spring onions.
Mix the dressing ingredients with some seasoning, then pour over the salad. Toss together well, scatter the feta over the top and serve with lime wedges, if using.
